resources.string:
Hello, my name is Maximiliano, and I am a software developer specialized in native Android application development.

The project consists of a simple yet functional wallpaper application, built with Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, and the powerful Unsplash API.

In addition, it follows Googleâ€™s recommended development practices.

The goal of this project is to test my knowledge and skills, as well as to explore and learn new areas within the Android ecosystem.
